metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6414 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
actionpack/lib/action_view/lookup_context.rb in Action View in Ruby on Rails 3.x before 3.2.16 and 4.x before 4.0.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a header containing an invalid MIME type that leads to excessive caching.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6414` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-actionpack-3.2 - 3.2.16-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-actionpack-3.2 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.16-3').
